comments.body:
The payment options are unusable in my country. NOONE here has a Mastercard, Visa, or AmEx card. NOONE.

At least add UnionPay or some digital payments like AmazonPay or bring back Paypal with bank verified accounts.

Yeah, I want more payment options. I cannot buy the account because of this. I have VISA card only for my country uses. NOT internationally use. If mojang add RUPAY on there payment methods at least I would able to buy one minecraft account. I am trying for past 5 and even made feedback for this. but no response.

Hello Minecraft, I'm a foreigner who lives in china because My father works here, I just wanted say that when I scan the Alipay QR code (if you don't understand what Alipay is, it is a fast and easy way to pay using QR codes [only in china]) it says "only China Mainland users verified", or something like that. Please can you change it so that all users around the world can use Alipay (by this means all the foreigners who live in china and if they have money) for this reason I cannot buy Minecraft.

Minecraft please respond and change or fix this as soon as possible

This problem still affllicts me in 2022, my debit cards neither don't have a CVV, nor couldn't be recognized due to "The data passed in `verifyCard` did not pass validation checks." even if all the info is correct. Cannot believe there are still few selections in payment while we're marching into 5G epoch, this problem needs to be done, and be done right now.

This. Minecraft essentially pulled out of The Netherlands since hardly anybody here has a credit card. I don't know a single friend or family member who does have one. And for what? Now we suddenly can't play realms anymore. Just bring back iDeal or PayPal the way it was before. This change is really nonsensical. Seems like Mojang doesn't like money.
they must have unionpay

Yes, I also feel like any maps should automatically update to the new terrain and height, plus anything that has addon to make the map it could not be updated until the creator deems it ready for release. This caused me so much frustration as I wanted to play on the pirates of the Carribean world but the world was stuck in pre-1.18 terrain.
I play on one of my favourite marketplace worlds but itâ€™s still in 1.14 and I really want it to be updated so I can build new things and even add boss battle areas for the warden

I actually built my own city map on the city life world, just so we could get cars. The world we built was 1300 by 1300 in size. But lost all our progress because its stuck in 1.14. Ive messaged the developers regarding this issue, they were useless. Never helped me. So i lost 100s of hours. Ill never buy a marketplace world again. Its a waste of time & money. Largest con ive ever seen.
I <3 Anime! Anime for life! I voted!
I also like anime. however, maybe may yandere simulator? it has too much blood for a kid friendly game.
Yandere simulator and ddlc arent kids games though and might increase the games rating in some countries and at worst could get Minecraft banned from twitch due to yandere sim being banned in twitch

I wonder when The Minecraft Developers team, will add a game mode for a map that's Yandere high school map, with the city, for an example instead of one giant building like the school, why not add a city too? Because most of us in the Minecraft community would like that due to the time i had Minecraft theirs's still Minecraft players roaming around the school we already have, it's just that we want more, space, and that the school looks exactly like from the Yandere game, we would totally appreciate it, and not just that, but I bet you would more people to play on Minecraft, we already have the skins, we just want the right school building accuracy, just from yandere simulator, lastly for all of the developers, i really do appreciate your hard work on this game, theirs's hardly anyone left that appreciate developers, so I give you my appreciation, so if your reading this, i'm glad you are here keep the good work I love you all. From, Clayton (IRL)

I completely agree!!!! I have been incredibly frustrated recently because of this, it sucks to spend money only to find out that you bought something you didnâ€™t end up liking and wonâ€™t play it again
Yes bro everybody vote on this NOW!!!!
i'd love this!
Absolutely!
I'd love it too, but they've they've already said no to customisable capes so I wonder how it would work.
This cape should return on a yearly basis
It already exists, just download it off online

I would also love that we could use these within-bedrock-created-skins in Java, just like we can import skins from Java to bedrock. Bedrock skins have certain layers that look just perfect as they are.

Exactly! And to have the ability to see if an item has been discontinued. On my one account, I have a clock mask facepiece item I got awhile back. But on my alt account, I can't find it to purchase it again. Being able to actually navigate the marketplace is a huge barrier right now tbh.

To further extend this idea. Players have long wanted backpacks in the game. Now that we have character choices that are 3D, backpacks would make a great addition. However, they would need to move depending on whether or not armor is equipped. (directly against character model if "naked" or pulled back away from character model so that armor goes in between. This is to avoid Z-fighting of the back textures.) I've always wanted there to be a logical reason why I can carry so much stuff with me.
I can see this being something done for the skin packs made by minecraft themselves. It would greatly add to the variety of the items to customize with, plus incentives more people to purchase packs.
Yeah!
Yes, I was thinking the same thing because I want my character's head in Spartan armor.
This is a nice idea man!
I think that to make this work, a new version of skin packs would have to be made. With the parts making the skins, multiple png files making one skin.
Batman skin
Would definitely buy justice league skin
we should get this in 2025-2026

I really like the ideal and support it. It would be nice considering they need to overhaul the marketplace anyway if they want it to survive. Most people aint buying addons/behavior packs basically  that are  limited to 1 world is just plain stupid. Only kids will buy  it.  whitch unfortunately is their target audience but hopefully parents realize it's a crappy deal. Anyway with the way mojang/Microsoft is it would more and likely Be like a ( 70 mojang / 30 creator ) is more their style unfortunately.
That would be insane but i think Microsoft wants to kill Minecraft Bedrock by adding marketplace, removing mini games free mashup and textures packs and tutorials worlds.
Pls bring back mini games and tutorial!!!!
I want this i played the legacy console version since the summer of 2013 Staring with TU10
Agreed, buying something should give you access to it. It's unfortunate because i believe they would make double on addons if structures from paid templates could be exported/ imported

I completely agree with this! I just spent a few hours on a build on a copy of my Realm using the Better On Bedrock add-on with the intention of copying it over using HoloPrint. Now I'm finding out that I can't even export a file because the structure blocks don't allow that on world templates, like you said! It's now discouraging me from using BOB on future worlds which is a shame because of how many great things it adds to the game. I haven't regretted my purchase since I got it but I definitely am a little now. And I'm definitely not going to buy any add-ons from now on because of this. So really Mojang just lost a marketplace customer because of this annoying little feature.
I would love to see something for the Clone Wars, maybe something set around Siege on Mandalore?
The pack would be nice if it comes out please mojang make a prequel dlc

I would love to see stuff like geonosis, mustafar, Christophsis and definitely Naboo, Coruscant and Mandalore and felucia and also ships like the Republic Gunship and the republic attack cruiser and the separatists ships and the separitist and republic fleet
Pls add it I got the the star wars pack that's from the prequels and I wanna do the battle on mustfar
Can you make this happen for this coming Star Wars Day?  May 4th?
Good idea, but we don't exactly need it with the overlay.
I want this so bad, I mainly just want headwear, but would love other things like outerwear, shoes, and face items, this would be awesome.

Since Minecraft Java Edition already supports using custom skins with layered elements, it would be great to see similar flexibility in Bedrock Edition.
Capes already work with imported skins, which shows that partial integration is possible. Allowing more Character Creator items with custom skins could improve player customization and also encourage more players to purchase Character Creator cosmetics.
Thank you for considering this.
I love this idea! Then I can make a Illager clan where me and my friends all look like Illagers but unique with different clothes.
Its intersting but I think this should be simplified to just body types as to allow more mixing and matching
yes! They should add zombie base option as well.

this sounds pretty good

maybe i will do a concept of that

03 of 02 replies

 

Okay I misjudged the amount of characters I would need to express my absolute disdain for this purchase- Sue me.

 

My last point(s) of contention are this: If I can encounter ALL of this over 2 hours with how long this has been out for Switch, and then come to find out there's next to no active acknowledgment or transparency from support staff- Ya'll should feel bad about this disaster of an "experience" you've managed to fool people into buying using the success, reputation, and capabilities of the original product. I will absolutely be issuing chargebacks for the money I wasted on the frankly useless digital information I received for my money.

Good luck salvaging this mess. That is if any effort is put in to do so.
Agree! I missclicked on something i didnÂ´t intent to own... i lost lots of minecoins... =(

This is still a MAJOR AND POTENTIALLY ILLEGAL design flaw. I'm going to get my refund for a stray click one way or another. You ABSOLUTELY have the means to refund and micromanage people who experience this issue and REFUSE refunds? A simple "are you sure?" prompt would create a world of good faith between you and customers. If you don't resolve MY issue I'll crusade this singular issue as a reason nobody should buy ANY of your products. Show us you care Mojang.
YES
Please! We need these skins back!
Ya
Yes especially mcpe
Please add this it would be soooo cool
I agree my friend didnâ€™t receive it and I watched him place a copper golem statue but didnâ€™t receive anything.
Iâ€™m having the same issue.
I didn't receive it either
I placed a copper golem and never got my notification others say they got and have not got a cape either :(
Same
Same.

Me and my sister both absolutely completed the copper cape challenge, the afternoon after it was made public, Oct 13. I received a notification Oct 17 that my cape was on its way. She received a notification about the announcement of the copper cape challenge on October 14. As neither of us received both messages, it is clear that the inbox does not always work correctly for Minecraft news and notifications. Neither of us have received our copper capes by Nov 19, while we are very quickly approaching 30 full days after the promotion had ended, despite the in-game notification promising that these capes would be sent out 20 days ago while it was still October. There are online communities full of comments about this issue, where those who used the in-game challenge method have yet to receive their cape. I hope this can be resolved for all players who participated in this celebration of the Copper Age Drop. The last possible time to use Cape Codes is apparently Nov 20 at 10am PT, and I would rather that this is resolved before then so I do not have to choose whose account I use my one code on and who goes without the cape they are meant to receive.

I placed a copper golem the day after it was announced and I got a message saying my cape was on the way. I'm playing Bedrock on PC. I also placed a copper golem on my kids xbox and she has not received a cape either. We both received messages that our cape was on the way. 

Well, it's 30 days after the contest ended and there are no capes! I read in another post someone said they contacted support and support told them that they could not verify that they had placed a copper golem. Basically, Microsoft and Mojang have lost the communities trust. These capes are a one time thing and there is never a second chance. Now I will always remember how Microsoft and Mojang let down the whole Bedrock community whenever I see someone with a copper cape.

Oh yeah, I forgot this happened on a Realm where I am paying extra for every month!
Same thing here, I did the quest and mojang sent me a message in the notifications tab saying I had completed it and would be sent to me by the end of October but I still havenâ€™t received it

Given the amount of people affected and that it seems that Mojang have admitted that if you chose the placing a statue method then they cannot identify it and therefore we didnâ€™t get the cape, it seems like the only option is to just release it in a patch.
Will we ever receive it? I placed two golem statues and have heard nothing about it from the game.

Same here. I have the in-game notification saying my cape is on the way.

Support were no help. Time the issue was publicly recognized by Mojang.
Itâ€™s almost December and I still havenâ€™t gotten my copper cape. I believe it shouldnâ€™t be this hard to add pixel art to an account

Like some of the others, I placed the golem and never got an email saying anything. But when I tried contacting support about it they told me to wait until November 20th since that's 30 days after the event. I opened a ticket and was told I had to prove I did the event. Well, obviously, I didn't record placing the copper golem statue, the T&C never said to, and now the support just tells me that because I can't prove I placed the golem, they won't give me the cape. I took a picture of the golem statue I placed during the event, but never moved, just in case (I did continue playing on that world though), and they say my screenshot isn't proof, so they won't honor it. And both times they've closed my tickets without allowing me to ask for a manager or ask how I'm supposed to prove I did the event. The event that never said I had to prove it in the T&C. Mojang doesn't care about anyone on Bedrock. Not getting the cape is probably due to a bug they caused, and they'd rather just blow off their players than do anything to fix the issue.

I placed the copper statues twice on two different world and had screen recordings and screenshots of both that I submitted to Minecraft support and they said they were insufficient proof despite being time stamped on the 17th of October.

Well based upon what others have said about Mojang not being able to detect if you have placed the statue, support insisting upon evidence of the placement of the statue (not in the T&C) and them choosing to not accept timestamped evidence, it now appears that the company has committed fraud.

Hello!

Thanks for asking about the Copper Cape granted for participating in Copper Cape Quest.

If your participation in events made you eligible for the rewards, please show the documentation that you participated in the event and send us proof that you completed the requirements for the item youâ€™re requesting within 30 days of receiving this message. You can reply to this message and attach screenshots in .jpg or .png format that verify that youâ€™re eligible.

Oh, sure buddy, could you send me a list of the documentation that you would accept and I will get it to you right away. It feels like you could have done that from the beginning instead of putting the onus on me. I did pay for the game, a realm and Xbox live just to play this game. You could definitely be doing more of the work instead of trying to brush me off with ridiculous request.

Thank you for your response. We are currently unable to provide a checklist of things or screenshots you need to provide proof.

As such, we couldnâ€™t confirm your eligibility and canâ€™t grant your request. Please look for future opportunities to participate in Minecraft events on Minecraft.net.

Thank you for understanding.

Best regards,
Koree S.
If this isnâ€™t the right place to report this where do we go to do so?

I got my notification too, but no cape, and it's the 29th of November now, where tf is my cape? I almost didn't even see the event in time, so I barely did it in time, but no cape. I'm tired of waiting Minecraft, just give me my cape and all the others you've shorted out of their capes too
Same. I got a notification that it was on its way but it's been a month since I should've gotten it and its still not there.

Oh my days, dude. I've been looking everywhere to see if anyone else was having this problem!!!

I placed down a fully oxidized copper golem several times in my world and, what do you know, nothing is in my account still. I deliberately went out of my way to launch Bedrock on PC, of which is something I basically never do anymore, just to complete this challenge.

And to rub salt in the wound, I got the watch time reward too! But because I was busy around the time I received it, I didn't know I got a code until it expired. So now I'm just sitting here wondering if they'll fix this or what. This is honestly ridiculous, especially since if they can't even keep track of who completed the in-game activity, they should have never listed it as a way to get the cape.

Seriously. So frustrating, and honestly more than just a little bit disappointing.

What is really disappointing is that they are not even recognizing to the community that there was a problem/bug with their system. To state that an in-game notification is not proof of eligibility essentially suggest we did not complete properly or are lying . . . .

Hi all.

SUCCESS!

So i had to send support a video capture of me logging in to minecraft, showing the notification re the cape, and the cape inventory showing it not there. I used discord for the video capture.

Cape is now there.

GL
When I tried to give them a screen recording they said they could only accept jpeg and png. So how did you get them to look at a video?

Ok, here is the fix.

Go to the bell in the bottom left hand of the login screen, where you would go to see about new Minecraft news, and scroll down until you see a notification that says â€œYour cape is on the way.â€ Take a screenshot of this and also take a screenshot of your cape inventory.

If you play bedrock, look for this notification on your pc, phone, xbox and play station as it may only be in one of those locations despite playing on more than one of them.

I normally play on pc, but I found the notification on my phone. I think uninstalling and reinstalling as a troubleshooting step for the recent memory leak may have erased my message logs, but that is just speculation as it may have never been there to begin with.

After you have both screenshots, go to mojang support. They will not let you open a ticket right away. You will need to say you need help with account and then keep clicking account until it gives you a list of articles. Open one, it doesnâ€™t matter which one, and then scroll to the bottom. There you will see â€œcontact support.â€ Create a new ticket there with your screen shots.

Mojang, Iâ€™ll be waiting for you to contact me about a support role with your company. I use to do support for Apple and NAPA. I have some great ideas that would help you out.
To the person asking about a jpeg instead of a video. You can try taking a screen shot of the video, but they may only accept a screenshot of the notification.

Success! Thank you to the one who said to use screenshots. It is literally just getting a ticket started, explaining that you used the statue method but didnâ€™t get the cape, got the notification about the cape being on its way (get a picture or screenshot of the message) and say that you still havenâ€™t received it (include a picture of your cape collection). They will then add it to your account.
I still have not received my copper cap, how do I get help?
I can't believe they'd remove them... This is homophobic ðŸ¥€
YES PLS

Message to Mojang / Minecraft
In 2023, you added a Pride cape to Minecraft â€” a symbol of inclusion and support for the LGBTQ+ community. Now, in June 2025, that cape is gone. Itâ€™s disappointing to see such a meaningful gesture taken away.

Visibility and respect should never be temporary. We hope Mojang will choose once again to stand clearly in support of all communities.
I want a Pride Cape to my inventory for collection and so I can wear it please add back this cape
